Microbenchmarking chk

Source: vignettes/benchmarking-chk.Rmd
benchmarking-chk.Rmd
library(chk)
library(microbenchmark)
fun_chk <- function(x, chk = TRUE) {
  if(isTRUE(chk)) chk_flag(x)
  x
}

fun_chk2 <- function(x) fun_chk(x, chk = FALSE)

fun_option <- function(x) {
  if(isTRUE(getOption("chk.chk", TRUE))) chk_flag(x)
  x
}

fun_option2 <- function(x) {
  chk.chk <- options(chk.chk = FALSE)
  on.exit(options(chk.chk))
  fun_option(x)
}

microbenchmark(
  fun_chk2(1),
  fun_chk2(TRUE),
  fun_option2(1),
  fun_option2(TRUE)
)
#> Unit: nanoseconds
#>               expr  min     lq      mean median     uq      max neval
#>        fun_chk2(1)  981 1075.5  24255.60 1145.5 1197.0  2308547   100
#>     fun_chk2(TRUE)  981 1042.0   1143.16 1120.5 1178.0     2872   100
#>     fun_option2(1) 3179 3383.5   3760.92 3473.0 3636.5    12152   100
#>  fun_option2(TRUE) 3194 3390.5 190362.53 3526.5 3685.0 18637859   100
